mn68:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu viharati naḷakapāne palāsavane.
mn68:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā kulaputtā bhagavantaṃ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā honti—
mn68:3.4: āyasmā ca anuruddho, āyasmā ca bhaddiyo, āyasmā ca kimilo, āyasmā ca bhagu, āyasmā ca koṇḍañño, āyasmā ca revato, āyasmā ca ānando, aññe ca abhiññātā abhiññātā kulaputtā.
mn68:3.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhusaṃghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
mn68:3.6: Atha kho bhagavā te kulaputte ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn68:3.7: “ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtā mamaṃ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū abhiratā brahmacariye”ti?
mn68:3.8: Evaṃ vutte, te bhikkhū tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
mn68:4.1: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā te kulaputte ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn68:4.2: “ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtā mamaṃ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū abhiratā brahmacariye”ti?
mn68:4.3: Dutiyampi kho te bhikkhū tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
mn68:5.1: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā te kulaputte ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn68:5.2: “ye te, bhikkhave, kulaputtā mamaṃ uddissa saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, kacci te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū abhiratā brahmacariye”ti?
mn68:5.3: Tatiyampi kho te bhikkhū tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
mn68:6.3: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ āmantesi:
mn68:6.5: “Taggha mayaṃ, bhante, abhiratā brahmacariye”ti. “
mn68:6.7: Etaṃ kho, anuruddhā, tumhākaṃ patirūpaṃ kulaputtānaṃ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānaṃ yaṃ tumhe abhirameyyātha brahmacariye.
mn68:6.8: Yena tumhe, anuruddhā, bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā susukāḷakesā kāme paribhuñjeyyātha tena tumhe, anuruddhā, bhadrenapi yobbanena samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā susukāḷakesā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā.
mn68:6.9: Te ca kho pana tumhe, anuruddhā, neva rājābhinītā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, na corābhinītā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, na iṇaṭṭā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, na bhayaṭṭā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā, nājīvikāpakatā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā.
mn68:6.10: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn68:6.11: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti—
mn68:6.12: nanu tumhe, anuruddhā, evaṃ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti?
mn68:8.1: “Evaṃ pabbajitena ca pana, anuruddhā, kulaputtena kimassa karaṇīyaṃ?
mn68:8.2: Vivekaṃ, anuruddhā, kāmehi vivekaṃ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṃ nādhigacchati aññaṃ vā tato santataraṃ, tassa abhijjhāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, byāpādopi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, thinamiddhampi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati uddhaccakukkuccampi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, vicikicchāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, aratīpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, tandīpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn68:8.3: Vivekaṃ, anuruddhā, kāmehi vivekaṃ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṃ nādhigacchati aññaṃ vā tato santataraṃ.
mn68:9.1: Vivekaṃ, anuruddhā, kāmehi vivekaṃ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṃ adhigacchati aññaṃ vā tato santataraṃ, tassa abhijjhāpi cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, byāpādopi cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, thinamiddhampi cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, uddhaccakukkuccampi cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, vicikicchāpi cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, aratīpi cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, tandīpi cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
mn68:9.2: Vivekaṃ, anuruddhā, kāmehi vivekaṃ akusalehi dhammehi pītisukhaṃ adhigacchati aññaṃ vā tato santataraṃ.
mn68:10.2: ‘ye āsavā saṃkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā, appahīnā te tathāgatassa;
mn68:10.3: tasmā tathāgato saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī’”ti?
mn68:11.1: “Na kho no, bhante, bhagavati evaṃ hoti:
mn68:11.2: ‘ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā, appahīnā te tathāgatassa;
mn68:11.3: tasmā tathāgato saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī’ti.
mn68:11.4: Evaṃ kho no, bhante, bhagavati hoti:
mn68:11.5: ‘ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā, pahīnā te tathāgatassa;
mn68:11.6: tasmā tathāgato saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī’”ti.
mn68:12.2: Tathāgatassa, anuruddhā, ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā, pahīnā te ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
mn68:12.3: Seyyathāpi, anuruddhā, tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo punavirūḷhiyā;
mn68:12.4: evameva kho, anuruddhā, tathāgatassa ye āsavā saṅkilesikā ponobbhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā, pahīnā te ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā;
mn68:12.5: tasmā tathāgato saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodeti.
mn68:13.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, anuruddhā, kaṃ atthavasaṃ sampassamāno tathāgato sāvake abbhatīte kālaṅkate upapattīsu byākaroti:
mn68:14.2: Sādhu vata, bhante, bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho.
mn68:15.1: “Na kho, anuruddhā, tathāgato janakuhanatthaṃ na janalapanatthaṃ na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsatthaṃ na ‘iti maṃ jano jānātū’ti sāvake abbhatīte kālaṅkate upapattīsu byākaroti:
mn68:15.3: Santi ca kho, anuruddhā, kulaputtā saddhā uḷāravedā uḷārapāmojjā.
mn68:15.4: Te taṃ sutvā tadatthāya cittaṃ upasaṃharanti.
mn68:15.5: Tesaṃ taṃ, anuruddhā, hoti dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
mn68:16.5: So kho panassa āyasmā sāmaṃ diṭṭho vā hoti anussavassuto vā:
mn68:16.6: ‘evaṃsīlo so āyasmā ahosi itipi, evaṃdhammo so āyasmā ahosi itipi, evaṃpañño so āyasmā ahosi itipi, evaṃvihārī so āyasmā ahosi itipi, evaṃvimutto so āyasmā ahosi itipī’ti.
mn68:16.7: So tassa saddhañca sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussaranto tadatthāya cittaṃ upasaṃharati.
mn68:16.8: Evampi kho, anuruddhā, bhikkhuno phāsuvihāro hoti.
